LanguageData.HugsLib_settings_resetAll_prompt: Reset all mod settings to their original values?
LanguageData.HugsLib_settings_noSettings: No mods with configurable settings are loaded.
LanguageData.HugsLib_setting_showNews_desc: Allows newly installed mods to highlight their new features in a pop-up window when you start your game.
LanguageData.HugsLib_setting_allNews_desc: Shows all available mod update news, including those that have already been displayed.
LanguageData.HugsLib_setting_allNews_fail: None of the active mods have any update news to display.
LanguageData.HugsLib_features_description: The following mod updates were installed, and these are the new features and improvements that came with them.\nYou can disable this dialog in Options > Mod Settings
LanguageData.HugsLib_features_linkDesc: Opens your browser on a page where you can learn more about this update.\nAddress: {0}
LanguageData.HugsLib_logs_shareConfirmMessage:
Upload game logs now?

This will post your game logs to a public server and give you the link to share with others. This is useful if you need help fixing a problem or would like to report an issue to a mod author.

No private information will be shared.
LanguageData.HugsLib_restart_language_text: The game language has changed. The game will now restart automatically.
LanguageData.HugsLib_loadOrderWarning_text: The HugsLib mod should always be loaded after Core to avoid issues.\nPlease adjust your mod order in the Mods menu and restart the game.
